text: Act to amend section 22 of the Act of 30th December, 19294, respecting compensation for industrial accidents sustained by seamen [adds following words at end of § 22:— ‘‘if the vessel is propelled by an oil engine of less than 60 h.p., or is a decked sailing boat engaged in fishing or is a half-decked or open boat. The horse-power of the oil engine shall be ascertained in conformity with the provisions of the Royal Order of 7th June, 1930, issued under the Act of 30th Decetnber, 1929.’’}. (M. p. 266)
full_text: Jan. 6 Act to amend section 22 of the Act of 30th December, 19294, respecting compensation for industrial accidents sustained by seamen [adds following words at end of § 22:— ‘‘if the vessel is propelled by an oil engine of less than 60 h.p., or is a decked sailing boat engaged in fishing or is a half-decked or open boat. The horse-power of the oil engine shall be ascertained in conformity with the provisions of the Royal Order of 7th June, 1930, issued under the Act of 30th Decetnber, 1929.’’}. (M. p. 266)
